reporter_caption.center: WINDHAM v. CITY OF ANDALUSIA, 217 Ala. 450 (1928)

caption.center: Shelly WINDHAM v. CITY OF ANDALUSIA.

opinion.attorneys:
A. Whaley, of Andalusia, for petitioner.
E. O. Baldwin, of Andalusia, opposed.
opinion.opinion_text:
Petition of Shelly Windham for certiorari to the Court of Appeals to review and revise the judgment and decision of that court in Windham v. City of Andalusia, 116 So. 900.
Writ denied.
ANDERSON, C. J., and THOMAS and BROWN, JJ., concur.
